common.invalid-sender: You can only execute this command as a player.
common.no-permission: You do not have permission to execute this command.

blocksniper.description: Displays information about BlockSniper, or reloads the plugin.

redo.description: Redoes the last undone BlockSniper modification.
redo.no-redo: No modifications could be found to redo.
redo.success: Successfully redid the last undone modification.

undo.no-undo: No modifications could be found to undo.

clone.description: Clones an area using the specified format.

copy.success: Successfully copied the location looked at.

template.missing-name: No valid name has been given for the template.
template.success: Successfully saved a template file to %s.

schematic.missing-name: No valid name has been given for the schematic.
schematic.success: Successfully saved a schematic file to %s.

paste.description: Pastes a previously cloned area to the world.

copy.no-copies: No copy could be found to paste.
copy.success: Successfully pasted the copy on the location looked at.

template.nonexistent: The template %s could not be found in the template directory.
template.success: Successfully pasted the template %s on the location looked at.

schematic.nonexistent: The schematic %s could not be found in the schematic directory.
schematic.success: Successfully pasted the schematic %s on the location looked at.

preset-selection.title: Preset Selection Menu
preset-selection.subtitle: Click a button to apply the preset

preset-deletion.title: Preset Deletion Menu
preset-deletion.subtitle: Click a button to delete a preset

preset-list.title: Preset List Menu
preset-list.subtitle: Click a button to edit/view a preset

configuration-menu.title: BlockSniper Configuration
configuration-menu.auto-update: Automatically update the configuration file when a new version is found
configuration-menu.language: Language used for sending BlockSniper related messages
configuration-menu.brush-item: Item ID of the item that is used to brush
configuration-menu.max-brush-size: The absolute maximum size of brush
configuration-menu.min-async-size: Asynchronous brush size limit. If brush size is bigger than this, operations get executed asynchronously
configuration-menu.max-reverts: Maximum amount of Undo/Redo stores to save. Older ones get cleaned automatically
configuration-menu.reset-decrement-brush: Automatically reset decrementing brush to the initial starting size
configuration-menu.save-brush: Save brush properties of players on server restart
configuration-menu.drop-plants: Drop plant items destroyed/blown away by the LeafBlower type
configuration-menu.auto-gui: Automatically open the GUI when switching hotbar slot to one containing the brush item
configuration-menu.myplot-support: Whether to turn on MyPlot support or not
configuration-menu.auto-reload: Turning this toggle will automatically reload the configuration when closing this window

language.auto-selected: [BlockSniper] No valid language has been selected. English has been auto selected.
language.usage: Please select a language by going to the configuration tab in-game, using /b.

brush.restored: Brush of player %s has been restored.
